titleStmt.title: The end and confession of Iohn Felton who suffred in Paules Churcheyeard in London, the. viii. of August, for high treason. 1570.
titleStmt.author: F. G., fl. 1570.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fleetstreete, by VVilliam Hovv: for William Pickering: and are to be solde at his shop at S. Magnus corner,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Eche man desiers to haue reporte,".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
